thread.title: Elderly couple renew their wedding vows on Valentine's Day | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Elderly couple renew their wedding vows on Valentine's Day | Daily Mail Online

author: Laura House For Daily Mail Australia
title: Elderly couple renew their wedding vows on Valentine's Day | Daily Mail Online
text: Forget roses and Tinder dates! Couple married for 58 YEARS celebrate Valentine's Day by renewing their vows - and say the secret to a happy marriage is saying 'I love you' daily Laurie and Elaine Stephenson have been married for 58 years The happy couple married in 1959 and renewed their vows on Valentine's Day They dressed up for the occasion and were joined by their family and friends Mr and Mrs Stephenson met at a dance and say they have been 'inseparable' Mr Stephenson says for a happy marriage, it's important to say 'I love you' daily
